name: Hakuna Services, Inc
description: Developer of an on-demand waste management platform designed to make public spaces clean and tidy and make waste disposal accessible. The company's platform offers customizable junk removal, dumpster rentals, recycling and hazardous waste disposal, enabling customers to declutter with peace of mind and contribute to a greener environment.
one_liner: Developer of an on-demand waste management platform designed to make public spaces clean and tidy and make waste disposal accessible. The company's platform offers customizable junk removal, dumpster rentals, recycling and hazardous waste disposal, enabling customers to declutter with peace of mind and contribute to a greener environment.
